A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't say enough about how great this was.  Every scene was compelling to me.  The suspenseful opening fight sequence.  Luke teaching Rey to use the Force.  The intimate \"Force time\" scenes with Rey and Kylo.  The amazing lightsaber battle against Snoke's guards.  The urgency of Finn and Rose's mission to disable the First Order's hyperspace tracking system.  Luke's climactic battle with Kylo.  Rey clearing a path for the resistance to escape.  The beautiful score accompanying every scene.  The hopeful ending showing a new\, young Force user.  I loved every second of this movie\, and if you can forget about any pre-conceived notions you may have had going in then you will too!
